text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO "But two facts seem absolutely certain. First, China’s Communist authorities have lied, concealed and misled about the origins of the epidemic and the toll of the virus in China. Second, the World Health Organization has acted as Beijing’s handmaid." https://t.co/XrfHfjGGZA
